name: Fontawesome Question
description:
I am thoroughly confused.


I'm trying to understand what is the actual absolute truth behind the Fontawesome icon and how it should look, from the design software (In my case; Figma) to the actual rendered icon in the web browser. But I'm facing inconsistency as per my perception at least, .


Figma Icon Design Template, Figma Community File and the how the icons render on the Fontawesome website.


Maybe I'm making it more complexed than it has to be. But I've made a Figma file to illustrate the inconsistency, when it comes to resolution, aspect ratio, padding etc, from the .


The Github issue
